abstract: Letter from Rep Louise Slaughter of New York State responds to July 23 article on embezzlement scandal surrounding Malaysian Prime Min Najib Razak.
lead_paragraph: Representative Louise Slaughter writes that the scandal in Malaysia is one reason among many that Congress should reject the trade agreement.

headline.main: Malaysia and the Trans-Pacific Partnership Trade Pact

snippet: Representative Louise Slaughter writes that the scandal in Malaysia is one reason among many that Congress should reject the trade agreement....
